comment: The step when we are executing L3.extend(L4), L4 being a list should be added to L3. But why have you added the elements of the list. Acc to me new L3 after this step should be ['do', ['re','mi']]. Please explain.
That's the difference between .extend() and .append(). Extend(L3) first iterates through L3 and then appends each element it finds, Append(L3) just puts the whole L3 object at the end.

extend, which only works with a list, can only result in the addition of elements. append, which works with both list and element, will result in the addition of element if append(element) and will result in the addition of a list if append(list).
